quiz.question: Which dramatic collective noun names a group of crows?
Which collective noun refers to a group of ravens observed together?
Which collective noun names a group of eels often found in a riverbed?
Which collective noun names a small group of musicians playing together?
Which 15th-century book popularized many English collective nouns?
Which uncommon collective noun refers to a group of moles surfaced above ground?
Which collective noun is used for a group of turkeys on land?
Which collective noun can describe a group of flamingos on land or in water?
Which collective noun is used for a group of pelicans when soaring together?
Which collective noun names a group of whales seen swimming together?
Which collective noun names a group of giraffes standing together?
Which collective noun historically applied to a group of swans on the ground?
Which collective noun refers to a loose group of fish often seen while snorkeling?
Which collective noun names a group of pelicans floating together on water?
Which rare collective noun describes a group of blackbirds or similar thrushes?
